metadata.title: CVE-2019-15522 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. csync_daemon_sessionin daemon.c neglects to force a failure of a hello command when theconfiguration requires use of SSL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

csync2 - 2.0-25-gc0faaf9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: csync2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0-25-gc0faaf9-1').
